PHRASE.LANG: Lock-a-doodle is a fun social drawing game. Create Doodles for your friends to guess, accept random challenges from other players, or unlock Doodle Mode and doodle to your heart's content. The more Lock-a-doodle Doodle Packs you own, the more stickers, colours and shapes at your disposal for creating incredible works of art! Includes your first Doodle Pack for FREE! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle est un amusant jeu de dessin social. Faites deviner des mots à vos amis en dessinant, acceptez des défis de la part d'autres joueurs et débloquez le mode Dessin pour griffonner à loisirs. Plus vous possédez de packs Dessin Lock-a-doodle, plus vous disposerez de stickers, de couleurs et de formes pour créer d'incroyables œuvres d'art ! Inclut un premier pack Dessin GRATUIT ! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle ist lustiges Zeichenspiel für dich und deine Freunde. Erstelle Doodles, die deine Freunde erraten müssen, nimm zufällige Herausforderungen von anderen Spielern an oder spiele den Doodle-Modus frei, um nach Herzenslust doodlen zu können. Je mehr Lock-a-doodle-Doodle-Pakete du besitzt, desto mehr Aufkleber, Farben und Formen stehen dir für deine Kunstwerke zur Verfügung! Enthält dein erstes GRATIS-Doodle-Paket! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle è un divertente social game basato sul disegno. Crea dei disegnini che i tuoi amici dovranno indovinare, accetta sfide casuali da altri giocatori o sblocca la modalità Disegnino e realizza quello che preferisci. Più pacchetti di Lock-a-doodle possiedi, più adesivi, colori e forme avrai a disposizione per creare incredibili opere d'arte! Include il tuo primo pacchetto Disegnino GRATUITO! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle es un divertido juego de dibujo social. Crea Dibujos para que tus amigos adivinen de qué se trata, acepta desafíos aleatorios de otros jugadores o desbloquea el Modo Dibujo y dibuja lo que siente tu corazón. ¡Cuantos más Paquetes de dibujos de Lock-a-doodle tengas, más pegatinas, colores y formas tendrás a tu disposición para crear increíbles obras de arte! ¡Incluye tu primer Paquete de dibujos GRATIS! [#Legal]
Lock-a-doodle、それは楽しいソーシャルお絵書きゲーム。あなたが書いているものをご友人に当てさせよう！Doodleパックを保有すればするほどより多くのシール、シェイプと色が使える！最初のDoodleパックは無料で付いています。 [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle is a fun social drawing game. Create Doodles for your friends to guess, accept random challenges from other players, or unlock Doodle Mode and doodle to your heart's content. The more Lock-a-doodle Doodle Packs you own, the more stickers, colours and shapes at your disposal for creating incredible works of art! Includes your first Doodle Pack for FREE! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle is a fun social drawing game. Create Doodles for your friends to guess, accept random challenges from other players, or unlock Doodle Mode and doodle to your heart's content. The more Lock-a-doodle Doodle Packs you own, the more stickers, colours and shapes at your disposal for creating incredible works of art! Includes your first Doodle Pack for FREE! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle is a fun social drawing game. Create Doodles for your friends to guess, accept random challenges from other players, or unlock Doodle Mode and doodle to your heart's content. The more Lock-a-doodle Doodle Packs you own, the more stickers, colours and shapes at your disposal for creating incredible works of art! Includes your first Doodle Pack for FREE! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle is a fun social drawing game. Create Doodles for your friends to guess, accept random challenges from other players, or unlock Doodle Mode and doodle to your heart's content. The more Lock-a-doodle Doodle Packs you own, the more stickers, colours and shapes at your disposal for creating incredible works of art! Includes your first Doodle Pack for FREE! [#Legal]

Lock-a-doodle is a fun social drawing game. Create Doodles for your friends to guess, accept random challenges from other players, or unlock Doodle Mode and doodle to your heart's content. The more Lock-a-doodle Doodle Packs you own, the more stickers, colors and shapes at your disposal for creating incredible works of art! Includes your first Doodle Pack for FREE! [#Legal]

You have been invited to play Lock-a-doodle, a social drawing game available in the PlayStation®Home Store. Draw and guess words, with friends, or challenge random people across the world.

Vous avez été invité(e) à jouer à Lock-a-doodle, un jeu de dessin social disponible dans le PlayStation®Home Store. Dessinez et devinez des mots, avec des amis, ou jouez avec des personnes au hasard dans le monde entier.

Du wurdest zu Lock-a-doodle eingeladen, dem lustiges Zeichenspiel, das im PlayStation®Home Store erhältlich ist. Zeichne und errate Wörter mit Freunden oder fordere zufällige Gegner auf der der ganzen Welt heraus.

Sei stato invitato a giocare a Lock-a-doodle, un social game basato sul disegno disponibile su PlayStation®Home Store. Disegna e indovina le parole con gli amici o sfida persone a caso da tutto il mondo.

Te han invitado a jugar a Lock-a-doodle, un juego de dibujo social disponible en la PlayStation®Home Store. Dibuja y adivina palabras jugando con tus amigos o desafía a jugadores aleatorios de todo el mundo.
PlayStation®Home Storeのソーシャルお絵かきゲームのLock-a-doodleへ招待されました。お絵かきをして何を描いたか当ててみよう！

Keep an eye on the Paint Bar. Once it's empty, you can't add anything more to your Doodle.
Gardez un œil sur la barre de peinture. Lorsqu'elle est vide, vous ne pouvez plus rien ajouter à votre dessin.

No pierdas de vista la Barra de pintura. Cuando se vacíe, no podrás añadir nada más al dibujo.
